title: Bajaj quashes rumours about high price of newly launched Triumph Street 400 bike
description: Recently, in a tweet, a user alleged that the on-road price of the bike stands at Rs 3,38,598, which is higher than the ex-showroom price of Rs 2.33 lakh and created a big controversy among Bajaj's potential customers across the country.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
